snippet: New York City schools are among the least effective in the country in providing free breakfast to low-income children.
abstract: Editorial calls attention to report by nonprofit Food Research and Action Center, which has found that New York City's school system is among least effective in country in providing free breakfast to low-income children; contends best way to ensure that more students start day with nutritious meal is to put free breakfast in all classrooms.
lead_paragraph: New York City schools are among the least effective in the country in providing free breakfast to low-income children.

headline.seo: How to Start a Good School Day
headline.main: How to Start a Good School Day
headline.print_headline: How to Start a Good School Day
